trans-unit.source: Represents an asymmetric key for X.509 certificates.
trans-unit.target: 表示 X.509 憑證的非對稱金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> that represents the X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 表示 X.509 憑證的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509AsymmetricSecurityKey" /> class using the specified X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 X.509 憑證，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509AsymmetricSecurityKey" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="certificate" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm to decrypt the key.
trans-unit.target: 要用於解密金鑰的密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains the encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: 包含加密金鑰的 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 陣列。

trans-unit.source: Decrypts the specified encrypted key using the specified cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的密碼編譯演算法，解密指定的已加密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains the decrypted key.
trans-unit.target: 包含解密金鑰的 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 陣列。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl> fields to specify the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url> 或 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl> 欄位，即可指定演算法。

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate specified in the constructor does not have a private key.
trans-unit.target: 指定於建構函式中的 X.509 憑證沒有私密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The X.509 certificate has a private key, but it was not generated using the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: X.509 憑證有私密金鑰，但該金鑰不是用 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 演算法產生的。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The X.509 certificate has a private key, it was generated using the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> algorithm, but the <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm.KeyExchangeAlgorithm" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: X.509 憑證有私密金鑰，且該金鑰是用 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 演算法產生的，但是 <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm.KeyExchangeAlgorithm" /> 屬性是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="algorithm" /> parameter is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援 <paramref name="algorithm" /> 參數。

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms are <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url" /> and <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl" />.
trans-unit.target: 支援的演算法為 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl" />。

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm to encrypt the key.
trans-unit.target: 要用於加密金鑰的密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains the key to encrypt.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 陣列，其中包含要加密的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Encrypts the specified encrypted key using the specified cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的密碼編譯演算法，加密指定的已加密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains the encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: 包含加密金鑰的 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 陣列。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url> or <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl> fields to specify the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url> 或 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl> 欄位，即可指定演算法。

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate specified in the constructor has a public key that was not generated using the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 指定於建構函式中的 X.509 憑證有公開金鑰，但該金鑰不是使用 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" /> 演算法產生的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="algorithm" /> parameter is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援 <paramref name="algorithm" /> 參數。

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms are <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url" /> and <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl" />.
trans-unit.target: 支援的演算法為 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl" />。

trans-unit.source: The asymmetric algorithm to create.
trans-unit.target: 要建立的非對稱演算法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when a private key is required to create the algorithm; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要使用私密金鑰來建立演算法，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified asymmetric cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定的非對稱密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm" /> that represents the specified asymmetric cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm" />，表示指定的非對稱密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> fields to specify the `algorithm` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url>、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl>、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> 或 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> 欄位，即可指定 `algorithm` 參數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="privateKey" /> is <see langword="true" /> and the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor does not have a private key.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="privateKey" /> 是 <see langword="true" />，而且建構函式所指定的 X.509 憑證沒有私密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: -or-

<paramref name="algorithm" /> is <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" /> and the public or private key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="algorithm" /> 是 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />，而且建構函式中所指定 X.509 憑證之公開金鑰或私密金鑰的類型不是 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-

<paramref name="algorithm" /> is <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" /> or <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" /> and the public or private key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="algorithm" /> 是 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url" />、<see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl" />、<see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />，而且建構函式中所指定 X.509 憑證之公開金鑰或私密金鑰的類型不是 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="algorithm" /> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援 <paramref name="algorithm" />。

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms are <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" />, and <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />.
trans-unit.target: 支援的演算法為 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />、<see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url" />、<see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl" />、<see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />。

trans-unit.source: The hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 雜湊演算法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a cryptographic algorithm that generates a hash for a digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來產生數位簽章之雜湊的密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm" /> that generates hashes for digital signatures.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm" />，它會產生數位簽章的雜湊。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> fields to specify the `algorithm` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> 或 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> 欄位，即可指定 `algorithm` 參數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="algorithm" /> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援 <paramref name="algorithm" />。

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms are <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" />, and <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />.
trans-unit.target: 支援的演算法為 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />、<see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />。

trans-unit.source: The de-formatter algorithm for the digital signature to get an instance of.
trans-unit.target: 要取得其執行個體之數位簽章的變形項演算法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the de-formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 取得數位簽章的變形項演算法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter" /> that represents the de-formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter" />，表示數位簽章的變形項演算法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> fields to specify the `algorithm` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> 或 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> 欄位，即可指定 `algorithm` 參數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="algorithm" /> is <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" /> and the public key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="algorithm" /> 是 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />，而且建構函式中所指定 X.509 憑證之公開金鑰的類型不是 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-

<paramref name="algorithm" /> is <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" /> or <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" /> and the public key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="algorithm" /> 是 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />，而且建構函式中所指定 X.509 憑證之公開金鑰的類型不是 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="algorithm" /> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援 <paramref name="algorithm" />。

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms are <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />,
trans-unit.target: 支援的演算法為 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />、

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" />, and <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" />和<see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />

trans-unit.source: The formatter algorithm for the digital signature to get an instance of.
trans-unit.target: 要取得其執行個體之數位簽章的格式器演算法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 取得數位簽章的格式器演算法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter" /> that represents the formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter" />，表示數位簽章的格式器演算法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> fields to specify the `algorithm` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> 或 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> 欄位，即可指定 `algorithm` 參數。

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate specified in the constructor does not have a private key.
trans-unit.target: 指定於建構函式中的 X.509 憑證沒有私密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: -or-

<paramref name="algorithm" /> is <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" /> and the private key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="algorithm" /> 是 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />，而且建構函式中所指定 X.509 憑證之私密金鑰的類型不是 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-

<paramref name="algorithm" /> is <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" /> or <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" /> and the private key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is not of type <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="algorithm" /> 是 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />，而且建構函式中所指定 X.509 憑證之私密金鑰的類型不是 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="algorithm" /> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援 <paramref name="algorithm" />。

trans-unit.source: The supported algorithms are <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />,
trans-unit.target: 支援的演算法為 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />、

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" />, and <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" />和<see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the private key is a available.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值會指出是否可使用私密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when the private key is available; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以使用私密金鑰，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm uses asymmetric keys.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值會指出指定的演算法是否會使用非對稱金鑰。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when the specified algorithm is <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.DsaSha1Signature" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha1Signature" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaOaepKeyWrap" />, or <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaV15KeyWrap" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的演算法是 <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.DsaSha1Signature" />、<see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha1Signature" />、<see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />、<see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaOaepKeyWrap" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaV15KeyWrap" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm is supported by this class.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值會指出這個類別是否支援指定的演算法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when the specified algorithm is <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" />, or <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" /> and the public key is of the right type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的演算法是 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl" />、<see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url" />、<see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl" />、<see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature" />，而且公開金鑰的類型正確，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509AsymmetricSecurityKey.IsSupportedAlgorithm%2A> method returns `true` when one of the following is true:
trans-unit.target: 當下列任一情形發生時，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509AsymmetricSecurityKey.IsSupportedAlgorithm%2A> 方法會傳回 `true`：

trans-unit.source: The `algorithm` parameter is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl> and the public key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is of type <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>.
trans-unit.target: `algorithm` 參數是 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigDSAUrl>，而且建構函式中所指定 X.509 憑證之公開金鑰的類型不是 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>。

trans-unit.source: The `algorithm` parameter is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature> and the public key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is of type <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>.
trans-unit.target: `algorithm` 參數是 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSA15Url>、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlEncRSAOAEPUrl>、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigRSASHA1Url> 或 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.RsaSha256Signature>，而且建構函式中所指定 X.509 憑證之公開金鑰的類型不是 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>。

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 密碼編譯演算法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified algorithm uses symmetric keys.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值會指出指定的演算法是否會使用對稱金鑰。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> when the specified algorithm is <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.HmacSha1Signature" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128Encryption" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192Encryption" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256Encryption" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesEncryption" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128KeyWrap" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192KeyWrap" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256KeyWrap" />, <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesKeyWrap" />, or <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Psha1KeyDerivation" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的演算法是 <see langword="true" />、<see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.HmacSha1Signature" />、<see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128Encryption" />、<see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192Encryption" />、<see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256Encryption" />、<see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesEncryption" />、<see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes128KeyWrap" />、<see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes192KeyWrap" />、<see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Aes256KeyWrap" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.TripleDesKeyWrap" />，則為 <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms.Psha1KeyDerivation" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the size, in bits, of the public key associated with the X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 X.509 憑證關聯的公開金鑰大小 (以位元為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The size, in bits, of the public key associated with the X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: 與 X.509 憑證關聯的公開金鑰大小 (以位元為單位)。
